description: Non-Material Amendment to 17/14450/FUL (Demolition of existing house and erection of 6 bedroom, two storey house and semi-basement with associated alterations to access, parking and landscaping). For amendment details please refer to covering letter.
decision_conditions: The proposed changes would materially affect the overall character and appearance of the development subject of planning permission 17/14450/FUL and as such in the view of the Local Planning Authority would not constitute non material amendment to planning permission 17/14450/FUL.

Inspection: Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment: The works proposed are acceptable and will not have an adverse effect on the trees or reduce their amenity value. Recommendation: No objections.

The submitted plan does not have a scale bar. Please provideProposed Floor Plan at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example), showing the outline of the entire floor plan, not just part and all key dimensions for the proposed works. The plans must also show the direction of North
